info.title: MPC Client API
info.description: API for managing MPC shares, signing transactions, backup, and recovery.

post.summary: Generates MPC shares for both SECP256K1 (EVM, etc) and ED25519 (Solana, XRP, etc) curves.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization with either the `clientApiKey` or `clientSessionToken`.

metadataStr.description: Metadata in string format including chainId, client platform, server version, and performance details. NOTE: The chainId needs to be in CAIP-10 format, i.e 'eip155:1' for Ethereum Mainnet.

200.description: Successful response with MPC shares generated for both SECP256K1 (EVM, etc) and ED25519 (Solana, XRP, etc) curves.

share.description: A stringified JSON blob representing the signing share.

id.description: A unique id for the signing share.

share.description: A stringified JSON blob representing the signing share.

id.description: A unique id for the signing share.

message.example: There was an error connecting to the network to complete signing.
Unable to complete signing due to missing or corrupted signing share.

post.summary: Sign a transaction or message for any EVM chain or Solana

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization with either the `clientApiKey` or `clientSessionToken`.

metadataStr.description: Metadata in string format including chainId, client platform, server version, and performance details. NOTE: The chainId needs to be in CAIP-10 format, i.e 'eip155:1' for Ethereum Mainnet.

method.description: The signer RPC method, for example `personal_sign` or `eth_signTransaction` or `sol_signTransaction`.

params.description: The parameters for the RPC method.

rpcUrl.description: The node provider RPC URLs, such as Alchemy or Infura.

chainId.description: Stringified EVM chainId. (1 is mainnet, 11155111 is sepolia, etc...)

share.description: The MPC share stored from running generate but for a given curve. You will need to pull out the share for your respective curve.

data.description: The response from the signing request. If the request is expected to submit to a chain this is the transaction hash, else its the raw signature.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization with either the `clientApiKey` or `clientSessionToken`.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization with either the `clientApiKey` or `clientSessionToken`.

generateResponse.description: A stringified JSON blob representing the signing share.

share.description: A stringified JSON blob representing the SECP256K1 backup share.

id.description: A unique id for the backup share.

share.description: A stringified JSON blob representing the ED25519 backup share.

id.description: A unique id for the backupp share.

backupResponse.description: The stringified response from the backup endpoint.

share.description: A stringified JSON blob representing the SECP256K1 signing share.

id.description: A unique id for the signing share.

share.description: A stringified JSON blob representing the ED25519 signing share.

id.description: A unique id for the signing share.
